node.title: Singer MAY-A on being nominated for an ARIA Award at age 20
node.alt: White woman with medium-length blonde hair, dark eye makeup and a dark top in front of multi-coloured backdrop
node.description: Her five top songsÂ have been streamed more than 18 million times.
node.content:
["Twenty-year-old Maya Cummings\u00a0only performed about 10 shows in Australia before heading overseas for two years of touring, and being nominated for a major prize at this week's ARIA Awards.", "The Sydney-raised and\u00a0New York-based singer-songwriter, professionally known as MAY-A (pronounced MAY-AH), started writing songs when she was 12.", "She is now known for indie pop tunes\u00a0that delve into the fun and mess of relationships, heartbreak and finding one's\u00a0identity.", "Her five top songs, including tracks like\u00a0Apricots and Time I Love To Waste,\u00a0have now been streamed more than 18 million times.", "Curly haired and painted in tattoos, Cummings\u00a0gives off a carefree, nonchalant attitude, but her success stems from honest and authentic lyrics that many fans have connected with.", "\"It's literally pretty much [me] taking my diary and being like, 'Oh, what can I use in here and turn into lyrics?',\" she said.", "
A chance meeting
", "The bus that Cummings\u00a0used to catch home from school\u00a0would often stop\u00a0out the front of The Artist Studio, a music\u00a0development hub in the eastern Sydney suburb of Randwick.", "After uploading singing and comedy videos to YouTube and busking in town, Cummings\u00a0decided to enter the studio and meet its\u00a0owner, Christian. She\u00a0sang him the song Beside You\u00a0by\u00a0Sydney pop rock group 5 Seconds Of Summer, which, to the teenager's surprise, Christian actually wrote with the band.", "From there, Cummings spent\u00a0most afternoons in the studio taking vocal lessons. She wrote countless songs and recorded many demos with Christian before being signed by\u00a0Sony Music in 2020.", "Cummings's debut EP as MAY-A, titled Don't Kiss Ur Friends,\u00a0is\u00a0nominated for the Michael Gudinski Breakthrough Artist award at the 2021 ARIA Awards, which will be streamed live on YouTube from 7.30pm AEDT on Wednesday November 24.", "Cummings said she was\u00a0honoured to be selected, especially for music that has allowed her to process emotions while navigating the space between being a kid and being an adult.", "\"The main themes in my writing are self-deprecation, some influence from some hot girls, and ridiculous overthinking and speculation.\"", "
Understanding her sexuality
", "The 2020 MAY-A single Apricots\u00a0is about Cummings grappling with her romantic self.", "The singer has previously said she was once with\u00a0\"a mayonnaise man\", and figured she deserved better.", "Cummings then started \"obsessing about a girl in high school\" who she had never met, but eventually built a relationship with.", "\"Everything that I say is true, and everything that I sing about has happened,\" she said.", "\"The biggest driver in my life is music.\"", "When Cummings started writing lyrics about women, she says she was immediately given the title of 'queer artist', before she even fully understood her own\u00a0sexuality.", "", "
MAY-A's lyrics deal with themes such as sexuality, relationships and overthinking.(Supplied: Danny Draxx)
", "\"Thinking that I figured something out and coming out about it, and then like two years later [thinking], 'I'm not that,\u00a0and I am going to change, and this is going to be really awkward because I have to publicly state that I was wrong'.", "\"I've been more on the side of questioning, 'Maybe I like men now?' And then thinking, 'How am I gonna come up with a song about a guy I like?\u00a0Will I get booed\u00a0off stage?'.\"", "Cummings said the perceived pressures of fitting into a particular identity made her feel constricted, but she was now\u00a0empowered to be herself.", "\"I've had a realisation that nothing really matters, and if I'm going to put anything out there, the people that will like it will find it,\" she said.", "
Connecting with an audience in a pandemic
", "Cummings has recently taken to New York City to develop her career.", "Like many Australian artists, she said it has been difficult\u00a0to connect with\u00a0fans during the COVID-19 pandemic, when crowds became nothing more than \"incomprehensible numbers on a screen\".", "\"It's weird being offered stuff now, having absolutely no experience and thinking, 'How am I gonna do this tour when I don't even know how to sing into a microphone properly?',\" she laughed.", "Cummings will spend the next two years\u00a0touring, and appears more than happy with how things have worked out.", "\"I almost feel guilty about how lucky I've gotten along the way,\" she said.", "\"I just get to make stuff I love and have great people surround me and help elevate where it goes.\""]
